channel.title: [PI]2 questions about webclient[PI]
channel.description:
Ok I got it to load now.. but once it gets to a certain point I get an error that says is a black screen and it says "an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape" then it gives me 5 options to fix it. Was I supposed to include the 'Raw' Folder in the cache? Please help!
Also, I added the 'Raw' folder with the client before I jarred it.. Will this interfere wil anything? Please post and help me :) Thanks!

item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

BUMP!

Can anyone help?!

item.title: [PI]2 questions about webclient[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Penetration Penetration
item.description:
@Penetration wrote:

If the directory of the HTML files if /, then the client.jar goes in /, or you have to change where the HTML looks for it.

Read full topic
